configs.append(cfg)
print(' Total configs: %d' % len(configs))
return configs
# define dataset
series = read_csv(' monthly-airline-passengers.csv' , header=0, index_col=0)
data = series.values
# data split
n_test = 12
# model configs
cfg_list = model_configs()
# grid search
scores = grid_search(data, cfg_list, n_test)
print(' done' )
# list top 10 configs
for cfg, error in scores[:3]:
print(cfg, error)
